# YoUI Theme & Colors

## YoTheme API

```dart
// Actual API signature:
static ThemeData lightTheme(BuildContext ctx, [YoColorScheme scheme])
static ThemeData darkTheme(BuildContext ctx, [YoColorScheme scheme])
```

## AppTheme (Auto-generated by yo init)

```dart
import 'package:flutter/material.dart';
import 'package:yo_ui/yo_ui.dart';

class AppTheme {
  /// Color scheme — ganti sesuai brand/project
  static const colorScheme = YoColorScheme.defaultScheme;

  /// Setup font — panggil di main() sebelum runApp()
  static void init() {
    YoTextTheme.setFont(
      primary: YoFonts.poppins,     // font judul
      secondary: YoFonts.inter,     // font isi teks
    );
  }

  /// Light theme
  static ThemeData light(BuildContext context) {
    return YoTheme.lightTheme(context, colorScheme);
  }

  /// Dark theme
  static ThemeData dark(BuildContext context) {
    return YoTheme.darkTheme(context, colorScheme);
  }
}
```

## Generated main.dart

```dart
void main() {
  WidgetsFlutterBinding.ensureInitialized();
  AppTheme.init(); // Setup font
  runApp(const ProviderScope(child: MyApp())); // atau tanpa ProviderScope
}

class MyApp extends StatelessWidget {
  const MyApp({super.key});

  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return MaterialApp.router(
      theme: AppTheme.light(context),      // ← pakai method, bukan getter
      darkTheme: AppTheme.dark(context),   // ← pakai method, bukan getter
      themeMode: ThemeMode.system,
      routerConfig: AppRouter.router,
    );
  }
}
```

## Font Setup

```dart
// Font dikonfigurasi melalui YoTextTheme.setFont(), BUKAN di YoTheme
// Panggil SEBELUM runApp()

YoTextTheme.setFont(
  primary: YoFonts.poppins,       // font utama (heading)
  secondary: YoFonts.inter,      // font sekunder (body)
);

// Atau set dengan mono font:
YoTextTheme.setFont(
  primary: YoFonts.nunito,
  mono: YoFonts.firaCode,
);
```

## YoFonts (51 Fonts)

```dart
// Sans-Serif (Modern)
YoFonts.inter          // ← Default, clean & readable

// Serif (Elegant)

// Monospace (Code)
YoFonts.firaCode

YoFonts.robotoMono
YoFonts.ubuntuMono

// Display (Headlines)
YoFonts.oswald
YoFonts.bebasNeue
YoFonts.anton

// ... dan 23 font lainnya
```

## YoColors

```dart
// Akses warna langsung
YoColors.primary
YoColors.secondary
YoColors.success
YoColors.danger
YoColors.warning
YoColors.info
YoColors.light
YoColors.dark
```
## YoShadow

```dart
YoShadow.sm    // subtle
YoShadow.md    // medium
YoShadow.lg    // large
YoShadow.xl    // extra large
```

## Design Tokens: Radius

Akses radius yang konsisten via `context` atau `YoSpacing`.

| Token | Value | Context Extension |
|-------|-------|-------------------|
| **Radius Sm** | 4.0 | `context.yoRadiusSm` |
| **Radius Md** | 8.0 | `context.yoRadiusMd` |
| **Radius Lg** | 12.0 | `context.yoRadiusLg` |
| **Radius Xl** | 16.0 | `context.yoRadiusXl` |

**Usage Example:**
```dart
// Mendapatkan BorderRadius object
borderRadius: context.yoBorderRadiusMd,

// Mendapatkan nilai double radius
radius: context.yoRadiusLg,
```

## ⚠️ Common Mistakes

```dart
// ❌ SALAH — API ini TIDAK ADA
YoTheme.light(colorScheme: YoColorScheme.blue, fontFamily: YoFonts.inter)

// ✅ BENAR — gunakan lightTheme/darkTheme dengan BuildContext
YoTheme.lightTheme(context, YoColorScheme.blue)

// ❌ SALAH — font bukan parameter YoTheme
YoTheme.light(fontFamily: YoFonts.inter)

// ✅ BENAR — font diset via YoTextTheme.setFont()
YoTextTheme.setFont(primary: YoFonts.inter)

// ❌ SALAH — AppTheme.light sebagai getter
static ThemeData get light => ...

// ✅ BENAR — AppTheme.light sebagai method yang terima context
static ThemeData light(BuildContext context) => ...
```
